job description:
You will be responsible for:
  • Running and writing queries, analyzing data and generating reporting- Performing analyses to support key business initiatives- Reviewing and interpreting transactional data results- Monitoring, analyzing and reporting on daily and monthly key metrics- Maintaining daily and monthly reporting dashboards- Conducting competitive analyses, tracking industry volume shifts and performing other ad-hoc analyses as required
    Basic Qualifications for Consideration:
  • Experience in Data Analytics is required- Technical skillset to include SQL or other tools for data compilation and analyses- Coding experience in any language- Proficient in MS Excel- An analytical mind and inclination for problem-solving
    Preferred Skills, Experience, and Education:
  • Experience with MS SQL and T-SQL- Must have an analytical mindset and an ability to review and interpret data quickly- Coding experience in any language is preferred- MS Excel expertise- Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings
    Who We Are:
    We are a small company providing Automation, Business Intelligence and Financial Performance Management solutions. With years of combined experience in our industry, we truly understand our customers and provide focused and responsive service. We provide solutions that allow our clients to get the right information to the right people at the right time.
Job Types: Full-time, Part-time

Salary: $32,000.00 to $50,000.00 /year

Location:
  • Casselberry, FL 32707 (Preferred)
